name: highstock
description: Highstock lets you create stock or general timeline charts in pure JavaScript, including sophisticated navigation options like a small navigator series, preset date ranges, date picker, scrolling and panning. Highstock is NOT free for commercial use.  See the license here: http://shop.highsoft.com/highstock.html
